info.name: Biolinkdepot.org API Tests
info.description:
Collection for testing the Biolinkdepot.org API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Environment variable "token" has been set'] = environment.token === user.token;
tests['Blog\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(blog.createdAt).toISOString() === blog.createdAt;
tests['Blog\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(blog.updatedAt).toISOString() === blog.updatedAt;
tests['Blog\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(blog.tagList);
tests['blogsCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.blogsCount === 0;
